title: Hymn
creator_credit: Joseph Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A pleasing action portrait of Montreal and the Quebec scene. Students experiment with techniques - the zoom and accelerated motion and find no scarcity of subjects. It is a visual hymn with a lift, a vital frantic response to the charms of the old province.
creator_credit_for_label: Joseph Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
